break; case 11002: //magic skill lamp c.closeInterface(); c.deleteItem(2528, 1); c.addSkillXP(5000, 5); break; case 11011: //cooking skill lamp c.closeInterface(); c.deleteItem(2528, 1); c.addSkillXP(5000, 7); break; case 11013: //woodcutting skill lamp c.closeInterface(); c.deleteItem(2528, 1); c.addSkillXP(5000, 8); break; case 11014: //fishing skill lamp c.closeInterface(); c.deleteItem(2528, 1); c.addSkillXP(5000, 9); break; case 11010: //fletching skill lamp c.closeInterface(); c.deleteItem(2528, 1); c.addSkillXP(5000, 10); break; case 11012: //firemaking skill lamp c.closeInterface(); c.deleteItem(2528, 1); c.addSkillXP(5000, 11); break; case 11006: //crafting skill lamp c.closeInterface(); c.deleteItem(2528, 1); c.addSkillXP(5000, 12); break; case 11009: //smithing skill lamp c.closeInterface(); c.deleteItem(2528, 1); c.addSkillXP(5000, 13); break; case 11008: //mining skill lamp c.closeInterface(); c.deleteItem(2528, 1); c.addSkillXP(5000, 14); break; case 11004: //helbore skill lamp c.closeInterface(); c.deleteItem(2528, 1); c.addSkillXP(5000, 15); break; case 11003: //agility skill lamp c.closeInterface(); c.deleteItem(2528, 1); c.addSkillXP(5000, 16); break; case 11005: //thieving skill lamp c.closeInterface(); c.deleteItem(2528, 1); c.addSkillXP(5000, 17); break; case 47002: //runecrafting skill lamp c.closeInterface(); c.deleteItem(2528, 1); c.addSkillXP(5000, 18); break; case 54090: //farming skill lamp c.closeInterface(); c.deleteItem(2528, 1); c.addSkillXP(5000, 19); break; case 11007: //farming skill lamp c.closeInterface(); c.deleteItem(2528, 1); c.addSkillXP(5000, 20); break; if (c.randomed && (c.actionButtonId == c.statId[c.random_skill])) { c.randomed = false; c.closeInterface(); } break; case 14067: c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; c.updateRequired = true; c.closeInterface(); c.RemoveAllWindows(); break;

I’m getting a error on this code

if (c.randomed && (c.actionButtonId == c.statId[c.random_skill])) { c.randomed = false; c.closeInterface(); } break;
it says unreachable statement…If I remove this code my pop thing, stops botters which makes them chose a skill to continue, yet it will then keep saying “please choose the right skill to continue” after the interface is shut down. How Do I fix this?
